page.title: 14ECOLOGY:TYPES OF BIRDS
page.content:
We visited some people who were interested in studying birds,and one of them gave us some information which he has gathered this year.He is a fisherman. On 12th March,he saw flocks of small birds coming towards the coast.He thinks they were willow-warblers.
On 15th April,the first swallows were seen.Increasing numbers of swallows were seen during the next few days. On 17th April,a willow-warblers landed on his boat,and he saw several small flocks making for the coast.During 1984,he noticed an increase in the number of cormorants,and in the winter of 1984-85 there were more oyster catchers feeding on the rocks at Talland Bay than usual. We also made this list of birds seen in our area:-{(see Page 15)
